content: Fix field name mismatches: Change 'harvested_at' to 'harvest_time' in test data and assertions
Remove or fix hunt-stats endpoint test since hunt-stats URL doesn't exist
Fix hunt-add-bird test to use standard Bird API endpoint instead of custom action
Fix hunt-remove-bird test to use standard Bird delete endpoint instead of custom action
Fix response.data['id'] access - HuntCreateSerializer doesn't return id field
Remove debug print statements added during investigation
